links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)

[[Image:The 1979 Calendar of J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings.jpg|thumb]]

'''The 1979 Calendar of J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings''' was produced by [[Ballantine Books]] with illustrations from [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)]].

* ISBN 345-27648-5-595
* Dimensions: 13 x 12.25 inches
* Stapled
* Punched hanging hole
* Heavy-weight cardboard mailer
